item.title: India’s Urban Company soars 58% above IPO price in year’s most subscribed offering
item.description: Urban Company’s IPO, which opened last week, was oversubscribed more than 100 times, reflecting strong investor demand.

item.title: Groww, backed by Satya Nadella, set to become first Indian startup to go public after U.S.-to-India move
item.description: Groww's listing — expected later this year — is set to double as a major cash-out moment for global venture funds.

item.title: Al Gore on China’s climate rise: ‘I would not have seen this coming’
item.description: Al Gore and Lila Preston of Generation Investment Management talked with TechCrunch about recent headlines, including the tech industry's growing appe...

item.title: Meta Connect 2025: What to expect and how to watch
item.description: Meta is expected to unveil new versions of its AI-powered smart glasses, as well as a gesture-indicating wristband.

item.title: Same-day delivery comes to space, as Impulse promises satellite transport in hours, not months
item.description: Impulse Space wants to ignite a revolution in in-space logistics.
